name: BERINA RICE TERRACE
address: Jl. Ida KetBerina, Tista, Kec. Abang, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali 80852, Indonesia
review 1: We stopped here to admire the view of the terraces, we were happily surprised to find this little gem of a cafe. The atmosphere is serene, out of time. We had coffee, coconut water and fried bananas, delicious treats! The owners were lovely and friendly, they nicely offered to take a few pictures of us (time to play the tourists ðŸ˜‰).
review 2:
We had an Organic ginger tea and an organic coffee fresh from the garden and had the best fried banana ever! With an unreal view of rice paddies!
The owner is so nice everything is made with lots of love! Paradise on earth will come back !
review 3:
Very cosy place! We stopped there like for a cup of tea and to make photos by drone and canâ€™t go away during 2,5 hours))
In this space you can see the beauty of nature and feel yourself an origin part of this beauty.
Very simple cafe just at the roadside but inside you have really good tea and really tasty fried bananas! The owner treats you like relatives! She tells a lot about the plants and rice fields and other interesting things about real life of Bali people.
If I could put 6 stars for this place I would do it ðŸ˜…
review 4: So good I went there 3 times during my stay in Amed! Owners are so warm welcoming and friendly! The fried banana is the best in Bali and the views complete it! Everything is locally sourced (the bananas are literally grown next door) and prices are very reasonable!!
review 5: Beautiful. worth the stop. The owners are so friendly too and genuinely just want to share their beautiful view with guests. Tea and fried banana are delicious.

name: Amlapura
address: JJJ7+P3G, Kerta Mandala, Abang, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80852, Indonesia
review 1: Stopped by a sign on the road side offering coffee and fried bananas overlooking a beautiful valley and so glad we did. The owner is very friendly, the coffee and bananas were lovely and the view is stunning. Highly recommend
review 2: Fabulous views, good strong coffee and delicious fried banana. The lady was so welcoming. I would highly recommend a visit.

name: Rumah Nyoman Suamba Kerti
address: JJH5+6W8, Jl. Ida Ketut Jelantik, Tista, Kec. Abang, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali 80852, Indonesia
